messages.message: Invalid dfdByteLength. If there is Key/Value Data the dfdByteLength/dfdTotalSize must be equal to kvdByteOffset - dfdByteOffset.
messages.details: dfdByteLength is 96 but it must be equal to kvdByteOffset - dfdByteOffset which is 92.
kvdByteOffset is 196 but the Key/Value Data must immediately follow (with 4 byte alignment) the Data Format Descriptor so it must be 200.

messages.message: Mismatching dfdTotalSize and dfdByteLength. dfdTotalSize must match dfdByteLength.
messages.details: dfdTotalSize is 96 but dfdByteLength is 92 and they must match.

messages.message: Invalid DFD data. Not enough data left to process another DFD block header.
messages.details: DFD has 4 byte(s) unprocessed but for a valid DFD at least 8 bytes are required.
